A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Episode VIII is interesting. Either you loved it or you hated it. TLJ seems a bit out of place with its somewhat darker tone and story. It features the protagonist\, Rey\, seeking out Jedi master Luke Skywalker and her relationship with Ben Solo AKA Kylo Ren. All in all\, this movie is okay. It’s not great\, it’s not terrible\, it’s simply okay.
